import './company-add-coupon.css' import history from './../../../../../../history' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' import { getToday } from './../../../../../../../../utils/dateUtil' import CompanyService from './../../../../../../../../services/user-services/CompanyService' export default function CompanyAddCoupon() { const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/company/my-coupons') } const handleSubmit = (values) => { CompanyService.createCoupon( values.amount, values.category, values.description, values.endDate, values.startDate, values.price, values.image, values.title ).then( () => { alert("The coupon was successfully created.") history.push('/company/my-coupons') window.location.reload() }, error => { if (error.response.data.response) { if (error.response.data.errorCode === "CPN-002.002") alert("You already own a coupon with the title:\"" + values.title + "\", please choose a different title.") else setTimeout(() => { alert("Action Failed\n" + error.response.data.response) }, 0) return } if (error.response) { setTimeout(() => { alert("Login expired, please login again.") }, 0) window.location.reload(); } else setTimeout(() => { alert("Servers are currently down, try again later.") }, 0) }) } return ( <>
